text: The South's Oldest Rivalry may refer to: * South's Oldest Rivalry, the football game between the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and the University of Virginia * Deep South's Oldest Rivalry, the football game between Auburn University and the University of Georgia * Capital Cup, the football game between the College of William and Mary and the University of Richmond * I-85 rivalry, the football game between Wofford College and Furman University, dating to 1889.
title: South's Oldest Rivalry (disambiguation)
